title: Killbird
description: THEY CALL HIM EBAN THE HUNTER...Eban the Hairy One, Eban the Accursed. From the beginning, the sign of the gods has been upon him. But now he has tempted the gods too far. He has drawn down the wrath of the killbirds upon his unsuspecting people and has become an outcast, doomed to roam the wilderness.Yet in the wilderness waits his destiny. For only Eban can discover the final legacy of his tribe's ancestorsâ€”a legacy so awesome and frightening that, should he unleash his power, his world will never be the same...
author: Zach Hughes
